featured.text: To be qualified as “extra virgin,” the oil must also pass both an official test in a laboratory and a sensory evaluation by a trained tasting panel.
RTRI officials explain that deer have a habit of repeatedly snorting short, shrill sounds to alert other deer when they perceive danger.

other.text: In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.

A good government official has to ________

One former prime minister considered it important enough to reveal in his official profile that he was a type A, while his opposition rival was type B.

definition.zh_def: 官方的，正式的，與政府或權威機構相關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to an authority or public body and its activities and responsibilities.
definition.example: The official report was released to the public yesterday.
